subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Heat put in plenty of study time after their debacle in Game 3, but it didn’t do any good as the Spurs took a 3-1 series lead and moved to the cusp of a championship.
snippet: The Heat put in plenty of study time after their debacle in Game 3, but it didn’t do any good as the Spurs took a 3-1 series lead and moved to the cusp of a championship.
